title: Women's
textBeforeTable: GORE Bike Wear & Running Wear Size chart mountain biking Recommended Use: 1 side zip, 1 side hook-and-loop closure Pockets: integrated Alp-X Lady Chamois: 9.5 in Inseam: [body] 90% nylon, 10% spandex, [insert] 100% nylon Material: Tech Specs The Gore Bike Wear Women’s Alp X Pro Bike Short uses stretch inserts and a cycle-specific fit to make sure the fabric isn’t pulling every which way (especially in-the-crotch way) when you hunker down on your off-road adventure. Fixed inner bike tights with the Alp-X chamois provide padding and shock-absorption without the typical spandex-pad look. A front waist insert does away with irritating elastic. Description Item # GBW0119 Gore Bike Wear  ALP-X Pro Short - Women's $0.00
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Arm Length: Measure from the center of your back to your wrist with arms held out. Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
